:workday_ja: 通年（見学は4月下旬～11月下旬、積雪状況により異なる）

:description_ja: 江戸時代に天王川をせきとめてつくられた公園。春は桜や藤、夏のスイレンなど季節ごとに花と緑の景観が楽しめる。天王川公園の藤棚ではあたり一面紫色に変わる。
:description_en: a park which was made by damming the Tenno River during the Edo period.  With blooming flowers and green landscape, you can enjoy the beauty of each season such as the Sakura Tree blossoms, and wisteria trellis in the Spring and the water lilies in the Summer.  You can see the wisterias of Tenno park change color to purple on one-side.

:address_ja: 豊田市足助町飯盛地内
:description_ja: 香嵐渓の飯盛山は約4000本ものカエデで覆われ、秋には山の斜面や巴川の水面を紅一色に染め上げる。香積寺11世の三栄和尚が、般若心経を唱えながら1本ずつ植えたのが始まりと言われる。

:description_ja: 二見プラザに隣接する水族館でセイウチなどの海獣をはじめ、淡水魚、熱帯魚などたくさんの海の生き物を見ることができる。海獣ショーやふれあいタイムが人気。
:description_en:
At the Aquarium adjacent to the Futami Plaza, it is possible to see fresh water fish to include marine mammals such as walrus. 
 The aquarium includes popular mammal shows and allows guest to touch some of the animals.

:description_en: Kugushiko is known for being a large producer of freshwater clams, allowing you to experience harvesting clams for yourself. Clams can be taken as a  souvenir along with the memories of Wakasa road. Make your reservation for a once in a lifetime experience today!

:description_en: A park with the main attraction being the tower a large tower over 100 meters off the ground providing a panoramic view of the Kiso Three Rivers Park.  From the observatory you can see the Nobi Plains and the Kiso River.

:description_ja: アルペンルートの最高所で、間近に迫る立山連峰が圧巻。トロリーバスが発着する室堂ターミナルは、標高2450mの日本最高所駅。眼下に青雲が広がり、澄みきった空気が心地いい。

:description_ja: 国の重要文化財4棟を含む、合掌造りなど飛騨地方の特色ある民家を移築・復元。館内の古民家では、わら細工・千鳥格子・さしこ細工などの実演及び体験教室が日替わりで行われている。
:description_en: On Display are four large buildings containing the country’s cultural assets,which was relocated to the Hida region and restored.  One of the significant styles of these displays are the Gassho-style house.  In the rooms of the old house, they provide demonstrations, and experiences where you can learn about straw crafts, houndstooth, and needlework crafts daily.

:address_ja: 中新川郡立山町芦峅寺ブナ国有林
:description_ja: 黒部川に造られたダムで、日本最大級のアーチ式ドーム型ダム。高さ186m、長さ492m、総貯水量約2億トン。昭和38（1963）年完成。観光放水は6月26日～10月15日。人工の黒部湖には遊覧船もある。
:address_en: Nakaniikawa District, Toyama Tateyama-machi Ashikuraji beech national forests
:description_en: This dam which was built in Kurobe is Japan’s largest arch dome dam.  Its height is 186 meters and its’length an astounding 492 meters, holding back about 200 million tons of water.  It was completed in 1963.  The water is discharged between June 26th through October 15th making it a heightened tourist attraction.  Boats are available for viewing.

:title_ja: 豊橋総合動植物公園（のんほいパーク）
:description_ja: のんほいパークの愛称で親しまれている動植物公園。広い園内にはサイやシマウマなどがいるアフリカ園、極地動物館が点在し、数多くの動物が飼育されている。
:description_en: This plants and animals park has been nicknamed Non Hoi Park.  There are attractions ranging from African gardens to zebras, as well as a polar bar exhibit. The animal population of the park is increasing.

:address_ja: 伊勢市宇治中之切町、宇治今在家町
:description_ja: 宇治橋から約800m続く内宮の鳥居前町。伊勢独特の切り妻入りの建物が立ち並び、みやげものや食事処の店が軒を連ねる。町の一角に観光名所のおかげ横丁がある。
:genres_ja: 伝統的町並み・家並み
:description_en: From the town of Toriimae, you will find the Uji bridge followed by the Ise inner sanctuary approximately 800 meters away.  The Bridge is lined with unique gables, and you will find  food and souvenir shops as well.  This part of the town is a very active tourist attraction.

:description_ja: 二見浦の海上に鎮座する大小2つの岩で、太いしめ縄で結ばれている。これは夫婦岩の沖合700mに沈む興玉神石と日の出を拝す鳥居の役割を果たしているという。日の出の名所。
:description_en: On the coastline of futamiura there are two rocks, one large and one small, that are tied up with ropes giving the appearance that the rocks are like a married couple.  They stand approximately 700 meters from the shoreline  partially submerged.  These rocks are referred to as the “okitamashinseki” rocks and seem to be worshiping the sunrise.

:address_ja: 名古屋市中区三の丸１丁目１－１
:description_ja: 能舞台は総檜で伝統的な日本建築。併設の展示室には能に関する資料がわかりやすく展示されている。初心者にはイヤホンガイドでの解説もある。
:description_en: The Noh stage is made with Japanese cypress and was built traditional Japanese style architecture.  The adjoining exhibition room has easy-to-understand documentation.  You can even listen to guide instructions on the earpiece available for first time visitors.

:description_ja: 日本最大級の恐竜化石発掘フィールドに近い博物館・研究機関として、世界の注目を集める博物館。最新の研究を元にした特別展も開催され、大人も子供も楽しめる。
:description_en: Near the museum, there is a research institution housing Japans largest dinosaur fossil excavation field which has gained world recognition.  This is a special exhibition which was based on the latest research, which both adults and children can enjoy alike.

:description_ja: 世界遺産に登録された静かな山村。114棟の合掌造りの建物をはじめ、豪雪地帯に暮らす人々の独特の文化や民俗芸能などが数多く残っている。国の重要文化財、和田家などがある。
:genres_ja: 伝統的町並み・家並み
:description_en: There is a quiet mountain village which has been registered as a World Heritage Site.  This village is noted as having 114 “Gassho style” architectures buildings, which focuses on the unique culture and renaissance  of the people who live here and the heavy snow it receives.  Specifically, the Wada house is the most notable.

:address_ja: 桑名市長島町駒江漆畑２７０
:description_ja: 季節の花に満ちたテーマパーク。「ベゴニアガーデン」を中心に、広々とした庭園、露天風呂が楽しめる「里の湯」、地ビールレストランなどがそろい、一日楽しめる。
:description_en: A theme park filled with seasonal flowers and a “Begonia Garden" being one of the main attractions.  This garden is spacious.  Also, you can enjoy an open-air hot water communal bath and a natural beer at the restaurant completing your day in a joyous way.

:address_ja: 北設楽郡豊根村坂宇場御所平７０－１８５
:description_ja: ロッジやレストラン、キャンプ場、国民休暇村、山頂展望台等が緑に包まれたリゾート。春夏秋冬、バラエティに富んだレジャーが楽しめる。茶臼山高原道路が無料化され交通の便もよい。
:description_en: Featuring resort lodges, restaurants, campgrounds, and a mountain top observatory, this village is enriched by the surrounding nature landscape.  You can enjoy all it year round leisurely as its enriched in variety.  The Chausuyama plateau road provides access for all your transport links.

:address_ja: 名古屋市中村区名駅１丁目２－１
:description_ja: ファッションと食品が充実したデパート。トレンド感のあるファッションアイテムの品ぞろえには定評がある。名鉄百貨店のマスコットキャラクター「ナナちゃん」は待ち合わせ場所として有名。
:description_en: This place is filled with fashion department stores, restaurants, and provides a fulfilling trip.  They have a reputation of providing an assortment of fashion items which are trend setting.  The mascot for the Meitetsu Department store is “Nana-chan” which is famous for the locals and tourists alike.

:description_ja: 山々の風景と溶け合った、合掌造り集落。ユネスコの世界遺産にも登録されている。地域住民が現在も生活しており、集落内には8軒の民宿がある。集落の奥には相倉民俗館がある。
:genres_ja: 伝統的町並み・家並み
:description_en: Registered as an UNESCO World Heritage Site, this village provides landscape of what seems to be mountains which melt together, and structures built in the Gassho-style architecture.  In the back of the village there is the Ainokura Folk Museum and 8 hotels/inns to chose from.

:address_ja: 長久手市茨ヶ廻間乙１５３３－１　愛・地球博記念公園内
:description_ja: 平成17（2005）年に開催された、愛知万博で大人気だった施設。映画『となりのトトロ』の主人公の家。見学は予約が便利。観覧希望日の前々日まで購入可能。空きがある場合当日先着順受付もあり。
:address_en: Nagakute Shiibara months Hazama B 1533-1 Aichi Expo Memorial in the park
:description_en: This location is famous for housing the Aichi Expo in 2005.  It also is known for being the “home of Totoro”which is a popular children’s anime show in Japan.  You are able to take the “my neighbor Totoro”tour which you can conveniently reserve your tickets.   They can be purchased up to two days prior your desired tour date.  Should you forget to pre-purchase your tickets, you can also purchase tickets the day of your trip on a first-come-first-serve basis if there is available space.

:address_ja: 羽咋郡志賀町前浜地内
:description_ja: 間口5mほど、奥行き約100mという細長く深い入江。周辺は義経伝説が残されており、奥州に向かう一行が入り江に50艘近い船を隠したといわれる。
:description_en: Coves with a width of about 5 meters and run in a straight line for approximately 100 meters, there are folklore legends such as the Legend of Yoshitsune which state that Oshu hid 50 ships within the cove.

:description_ja: 環境省の「日本水浴場88選」に選定された白く美しい砂浜と遠浅で水がきれいな海。若狭路の海水浴場のメッカともいえるここは、若者や家族連れなど、多くの人たちで賑わう。
:description_en: Water which was selected by the Ministry of Environment in Japan as one of the top 88 places to visit, providing a place to see crystal clear water and pristine white sandy beaches.  It is also said that you will find the Mecca of Wakasa trail which leads to the amazing beaches  in the area.  Both young and old people, as well as families have deemed it as a popular place to visit.

:description_en: Water cascading down over 1600 meter mountains towering in the back drop find their way to a point where a waterfall approximately 21 meters high can be found.  The fertile area surrounding the waterfall has been utilised in wasabi cultivation and a walking path for explorers has been built.  The change in the water temperature is minimal.

:address_ja: 高山市奥飛騨温泉郷　新穂高
:description_ja: 日本初の2階建てロープウェイが運行。新穂高温泉駅から標高2156mの西穂高口まで3200m、約20分間の空中散歩を楽しめる。西穂高口には、展望レストランや千石園地がある。
:genres_ja: ロープウェイ・ケーブルカー
:description_en: Here you will find Japan's first two-line ariel tramway. You can travel from the Shinhotaka Onsen Station to the west Hodaka port at altitudes of around 2156m to 3200m.  The ride takes about 20 mins. In West Hodaka, restaurants and Sengoku orchards.

:address_ja: 郡上市八幡町柳町一の平６５９
